text: Rishi Kumar Nair (born 22 January 1991) is an English actor. On television, he is known for his role in the Channel 4 soap opera Hollyoaks (2017–2021) and the ITVX comedy Count Abdulla (2023). He is set to star in the ninth series of the ITV detective drama Grantchester (2024). == Filmography == * 2017–2021: Hollyoaks: Sami Maalik * 2024: Grantchester: Alphy Kotteram Category:Living people Category:1991 births Category:English actors
title: Rishi Nair
